welcome_message_body: Welcome to Beykoz, a charming district on the Bosphorus known for its historical landmarks, beautiful nature, and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Beykoz has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Meşhur Akbaba Köftecisi
restaurants.description: Meşhur Akbaba Köftecisi is a turkish restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: BEYAZ DAYININ YERİ
restaurants.description: BEYAZ DAYININ YERİ is a gozleme place located in Beykoz.
restaurants.address: Hz. Yuşa Sapağı (Anadolu Kavagi Yolu ÜZeri), istanbul

restaurants.name: Hanımeli-Akbaba
restaurants.description: Hanımeli-Akbaba is a restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Karakulak Dağ Restaurant
restaurants.description: Karakulak Dağ Restaurant is a turkish restaurant located in İstanbul.

restaurants.name: Sismanin Yeri
restaurants.description: Sismanin Yeri is a wings joint located in İstanbul.
restaurants.address: Akbaba koyu (Fener caddesi no:60/a Beykoz), İstanbul

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sabiha Gokcen Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Sabiha Gokcen Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1

terminals.name: Terminal 2

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
